objects.description: [RedDrop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0326) downloads additional components (APKs, JAR files) from different C&C servers and stores them dynamically into the device’s memory, allowing the adversary to execute additional malicious APKs without having to embed them straight into the initial sample.

external_references.description: Nell Campbell. (2018, February 27). RedDrop: the blackmailing mobile malware family lurking in app stores. Retrieved September 18, 2018.
